item.kubejs.enzymatic_essence_catalyst.t: Used in _Mixing Recipes_ to convert _Essence_ and _Experience_ into each other.
Be sure to allow _Fake Players_ on FTB Chunks properties in your team settings. If you want to just enable _Industrial Foregoing_ machines, add _[IF]_ to the _Allied Fake Player Names/IDs_ list.
block.industrialforegoing.block_placer.t: Be sure to allow _Fake Players_ on FTB Chunks properties in your team settings. If you want to just enable _Industrial Foregoing_ machines, add _[IF]_ to the _Allied Fake Player Names/IDs_ list.
block.create.deployer.tooltip.summary: Be sure to allow _Fake Players_ on FTB Chunks properties in your team settings. If you want to just enable _deployer_, add _Deployer_ to the _Allied Fake Player Names/IDs_ list.
item.magicfeather.magicfeather.tooltip.s: This item can be placed on the _Curio_ slot in its own slot. It will allow you to fly within the active beacon range.
block.minecraft.stone.tooltip: Generates when Flowing Lava touches a Source of Water.
block.minecraft.stone.tooltip.summary: Generates when Flowing _Lava_ touches a Source of Water.
